question: A 16-year-old boy was seen by a surgeon with complaints of swelling and tenderness in his left testes. This condition is most likely be produced by thrombosis in which of the following veins?

Which of the following is a surgical method performed for tubal ligation?

Which of the following structures is present in superficial perineal pouch of the males?
The levator prostate in males is a part of which of these structures?
Which of the following is/are involved in the secondary support of the uterus?

answers.option: Broad ligament of uterus and perineal body
Broad ligament and round ligament of uterus

question: Which of the following is the most common type of female pelvis?

answers.option: Between labia minora and vaginal wall
Between labia majora and vaginal wall

question: Which of the following innervates the levator ani muscle?

answers.option: Inferior rectal branch of pudendal nerve and anterior rami of S3 and S4
Perineal branch of pudendal nerve and anterior rami of S3 and S4

question: The greater vestibular glands open into which of the following structures?

answers.option: Vestibule on each side of vaginal orifice

answers.option: Around the bulb of the penis

question: Which of the following represents the intratesticular ducts in males?

answers.option: Efferent ductules, rete testis, and tubuli recti
Efferent ductules, rete testis, and ductus deferens

question: Which of the following is incorrect regarding prostate?

answers.option: 70% of prostate cancer originates in the peripheral zone

question: Which of the following forms the anterior boundary of pelvic cavity?

answers.option: Ganglia in or near the visceral wall or pelvic plexus

answers.option: Covered more by peritoneum posteriorly than anteriorly
Derives its entire blood supply from uterine artery with no collateral supply
Made up of fibrous layer only

question: A diabetic patient comes to the clinic with complaints of high-grade fever and a purulent discharge from a small opening in the perineal region. After examination, a diagnosis of bacterial infection is made. It causes the obstruction of the paraurethral glands. Inflamed glands are homologous with which of the following structures in males?

A female patient comes to the gynecology outpatient department with complaints of pain and swelling in the external genitalia which increases while walking or weight lifting. answers.option: Vesico-vaginal fistula that might develop after delivery
Vesico-uterine fistula that might develop after delivery

question: Which one of the following is the convergence point where spermatic vessels and ductus deferens come together?

answers.option: Ductus deferens -> ejaculatory duct -> epididymis -> penis
Epididymis -> ductus deferens -> ejaculatory duct -> penis
Ductus deferens -> epididymis -> ejaculatory duct -> penis
Penis -> ductus deferens -> epididymis -> ejaculatory duct
Ejaculatory duct -> ductus deferens -> epididymis -> penis
